messages.content: What libraries does the ComfyUI_FaceAnalysis extension use for face recognition?
ComfyUI_FaceAnalysis uses either DLib or InsightFace for calculating the Euclidean and Cosine distance between two faces.
How is the evaluation conducted for generated faces?

The best way to evaluate generated faces is by first sending a batch of 3 reference images to the node and comparing them to a fourth reference, which are all actual pictures of the person. This provides a baseline number to compare to generated images.
What are the installation requirements for using DLib with ComfyUI_FaceAnalysis?

To use DLib, you need to download the Dlib Predictor Recognition (shape_predictor_68_face_landmarks.dat) and the Dlib Face Recognition (dlib_face_recognition_resnet_model_v1.dat) models, and place them into the 'dlib' directory.
Where can I find precompiled DLib for Windows?
Precompiled Dlib for Windows can be found on GitHub at the following link: <https://github.com/z-mahmud22/Dlib_Windows_Python3.x>
